body_html:
So how would you tell a test to force GPU? Set force_device=True? That seems a bit counter-intuitive.

I think the easiest thing to do may be first fork TensorFlowTestCase to a new version that supports other devices, and once things stabilize, look at two versions side by side and see if it makes sense to factor out common functionality (and that the refactoring effort justifies the costs imposed by Conway's Law)

So how would you tell a test to force GPU? Set `force_device=True`? That seems a bit counter-intuitive.

I think the easiest thing to do may be first fork `TensorFlowTestCase` to a new version that supports other devices, and once things stabilize, look at two versions side by side and see if it makes sense to factor out common functionality (and that the refactoring effort justifies the costs imposed by Conway's Law)
